Scene 1: Enraged
A hill of closely-cropped, well-manicured grass Mimi stormed up. Each brisk footfall carried her further away from her village at a hurried pace. Her brow drew together angrily over her brilliant green eyes, and the corners of her full lips turned downward in a scowl that would have prompted foolhardy male suitors to attempt “you're beautiful when you're angry” placations. That is, if there in fact were any men around her village. There were not, because Mimi was a wood nymph, and every soul in her whole village was a lovely, nubile female, just as she was.

Mimi's splendidly large breasts to bounced heavily with each aggressive step her long legs took until she finally folded her slender arms over them to bring them under a little more control. Crossed arms suited her mood anyway. She was fuming mad. She was hurt, too, and at least one tear had escaped her watery eyes and slid down her amber cheek. Her friends were so cruel to her. Their words played back in her mind over and over again as her slender figure marched off into the forest beyond.

It was late in the evening, and the forest was rapidly becoming dark. A thick fog has set in several days before, obscuring the forest all around her village and making it difficult to see very far. Normally, the wood nymphs loved the fog, because fog meant mushrooms would grow, and food would be abundant. But the fog also made the night forest even darker and more frightening than normal. Through the dense mists far, far behind her, Mimi heard a voice calling her name. It was Cassia, but Mimi knew that Cassia and the others could not have seen which way she had gone off in the thickening gloom. Defiantly she pressed on. Cassia could go to hell.

Cassia was not the primary focus of Mimi's ire, though. It was Katya. Whenever the fog came and the harvests began, Katya was always so cruel to her. She taunted Mimi mercilessly, and entreated her friends to join in with her. Mimi was the object of Katya's ridicule because she had a serious problem—an impairment of a sort. Rightly, the issue should have earned her compassion rather than ridicule, but unfortunate ugliness in the world often causes things to play out differently, and those who do not quite fit in are too often receive so much taunting where sympathy is needed. Mimi's problem was indeed serious: she was always full.

Perhaps it sounds like an odd thing to call a problem. Maybe it seems unworthy of being called a “problem” at all. But, for Mimi's kind, being full was quite a serious issue indeed. Wood nymphs lived a mostly carefree lifestyle. There was little to worry about in their happy little village of colorfully-capped toadstool houses and grassy lanes. The fairy lanterns that lined the lanes cast a greenish-yellow light that warded off the night's predators. By day, the glow of sunshine on their grassy clearing let them frolic and gambol about with little to care or worry about. They could talk, and play games, and explore the forest, and do anything else that wood nymphs liked to do. It was all at their leisure from their merry little village. There were just two things that the wood nymphs always had to remember. The first was never ever to leave the village at night. The other was that when the fog rolled in, and the mushrooms came up, they had to eat as much of this single, short-term food supply as possible.

Indeed, mushrooms could not be stored for very long. Even though there were at least a dozen different kinds that regularly grew in the forest, every one of them would wilt and decay in just a day or two. And because the fog would sometimes take weeks to return, the only way the wood nymphs could live comfortably between harvests was to stuff themselves with as much of the delicious, soft fungi as possible. So when the harvest came, Mimi and all the other villagers had a duty to eat as much of the mushroom bounty as possible. As a matter of survival, it was simply wrong to waste them.

But unlike the other nymphs, Mimi would hardly eat a few bites before feeling that she could eat no more. While all the others were gorging themselves as was normal during a harvest time like this, she could only look on and wonder why she couldn't bring herself to do the same.

No matter how she tried, no matter how much she forced herself, she just did not have the appetite that her lovely friends all shared. Mimi couldn't help it. Each harvest that came around, the whole village would celebrate by gorging themselves until their bellies bulged to the point that they could barely move. Everyone except Mimi. She could only peck a little at her expected intake, despondently watching the others as they reveled in their gluttonous orgy.

To make matters worse, they all took their hunger for granted. As her best friends stuffed themselves, and their bellies bulged ominously from their svelte frames, they chided Mimi as she slowly fidgeted with her food, trying to muster the will to swallow just one more bite. She weathered their abuse, watching enviously as their bellies swelled out below their rib cages to become beautiful, rounded domes.

The type of toadstool that wood nymphs make their houses from has unusually fat stems. By hollowing out those stems, careful not to waste any of the delicious material from within, they made a single room. If the room had a name, it would be called “the living room,” because its the place where you sleep, and eat, and cook, and entertain friends when they visit. But they didn't actually call it “the living room,” because when you only have one room, there's no need for a name. It's just “inside.”

The room traditionally has only a couple tiny windows to let in some daylight. Curiously, there is also no furniture inside. Wood nymphs don't use any furniture except numerous fluffy pillows of various colors that they cast about the floor, and lounge around on as they socialize and eat. One corner—or what would be a corner if the hollowed-out toadstool cap was not round inside—always has a small counter for preparing food. Wood nymphs don't really cook, but they do wash everything they gather from the forest before they eat it.

As they sat in whichever cottage she and her friends had repaired to, Mimi considered her basketful of morel mushrooms wistfully. Again she was already full. Her belly sported maybe the tiniest bulge. Mimi surveyed her friends' swollen bellies, distending so gravidly that each one pushed its owner's shapely legs apart as it thrust out onto the floor before her. Among such wholesome waistlines, Mimi looked disgustingly thin. Even in the best of harvests, her bulging breasts, curved hips, and rounded posterior contrasted with her absurdly thin waist. In a time that called for bumble-bees, Mimi looked more like a wasp.

The definitive leader of her gang of friends was the ever-popular Katya. Katya had lustrous brown hair and an evenly tanned complexion that made her purplish eyes sparkle like amethysts. Of the four friends, Katya was tallest, and she had a style of dress that was distinctively her own. She decorated her tall, lean figure with various dangly earrings, amulets, bracelets, toe-rings, and anklets, all of them fashioned from bronze that had long since tarnished to a dull brown. On her legs, she typically wore colorful, loosely flowing pants, that looked like they were meant for a genie. Her feet would be shod with the same black satin slippers that all wood nymphs wore, but she would sew on tiny purple beads that matched the peculiar color of her eyes.

Although Katya was heart-stoppingly beautiful, it should be noted that all wood nymphs are uncannily lovely, with luscious and delicately symmetrical features. Aside from being unusually tall and gracile, what stood out most about Katya were her extremely large breasts. They strained at the loosely woven fabric of her blouse, and between harvests, when she and her comrades' bellies subsided back to svelte waistlines, they made her graceful figure look charmingly off balance. Of course, there were a few wood nymphs sported a bigger rack than Katya's—Sylvie for instance—but they were only a few, and none had quite the exquisite roundness that Katya's did. The big orbs on her chest were almost spherical, slowly coming to an slightly upturned, soft point just at the nipple, giving them a perkiness that was seemingly impossible for breasts so large. Consequently, Katya's breasts were the secret envy of all the other wood nymphs. On sunny days, when various meadow games were afoot, everyone wanted to play with charming and bouncy Katya.

11.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com
Of Mimi's friends, Katya was also by far the cruelest and was always the instigator of Mimi's torment. She would kick it off casually, almost as if she had no premeditated ill intent. As Mimi winsomely poked at her food, Katya would toss the first barbed comment at Mimi in an offhand manner, almost dispassionately observational manner, while talking through a huge bite stuffed in her mouth

“Theef are foe delishuff! [chomp] I jufft luff morelth...[gulp]...they're so sweet, you know? [chomp] They're—awww, what'f wrong over there, Mimi? Did you get a bad batch? Mine are theriuffly tathty! [gulp] I could eat them all day. In fact, I have been eating them all day!” she said, rubbing her swollen midriff where it's smooth, rounded surface was exposed between the well extended waistband of her pants and the bottom of her tightly stretched shirt. Slowly moving her hands outward to the sides of her gigantic tummy, she leaned back a little as she continued rubbing it, emphasizing it's girth for Mimi's inspection

When she finally leaned up back to normal, she leaned forward, reached out an arm, and grabbed another generous handful from the huge harvest basket. Very deliberately she shoved the whole handful into her mouth at once, throwing her head back and pushing the last of it down into her mouth vertically. A couple of them fell out and down to the floor. When she brought her head back upright, her cheeks bulged out hugely on both sides. She chewed slowly as she scooped up the two spongy fungi she had dropped, pushing them into her already-overfilled mouth without swallowing to make any more room

Katya chewed for a moment staring at Mimi with big, mockingly sympathetic purlpley-blue eyes. After swallowing some of the mass that filled her cheeks, she continued, “Look if you need shum help with thoshe, Mimi, jufft let me know. It'f getting cloaf to bedtime, and I luff to go to fleep wiff a big round belly underneaf me. [guuuulp] You know what I mean?” Katya looked down at Mimi's almost perfectly flat belly. “Oh...I guess you don't. Well, it's just heavenly. I absolutely love the feeling of laying on a huge belly when I go to bed. Especially when I have stuffed it so much that I have to stay use my knees for support. You know, because my tummy is so full that it raises the rest of my body too far off the floor? I stack up a bunch of pillows up to support my head, and lay there so contentedly.” Katya took another handful, no quite so big as the last, and stuffed it into her mouth, continuing, “Looksh like tonight iff one of thoshe nightf, I'll thay,” concluded Katya, patting her immensely rotund belly with exaggerated self-satisfaction. “I'm thelling you, Mimi, there'sh nothing like it! [gulp]”

“I soooo know what you mean, Kat!” Cassia agreed, rolling her big, liquid blue eyes so that they flashed turquoise in the fairy lanterns' light. Now Mimi's big green eyes painfully drifted to look at Cassia, dreading what was to come next. The inevitable double-team gang up. Fortunately for Mimi, Sylvie was still too busy eating to follow the conversation. But Cassia was certain to help Katya's fledgling campaign along

Another stunning example of wood nymph femininity, Cassia had a beautiful mane of long, flowing, sandy hair that hung to her ankles. She always wore dark brown tights, and the tights hugged Cassia's shapely legs exquisitely. At the moment, they were also straining to hold in Cassia's seriously overstuffed belly that rose like a big dome. She wore a loose shirt that had slid down the slope of her belly and now played softly on the forms of Cassia's exuberant breasts. Cassia's breasts were not nearly as huge as Katya's—for that matter, not even as big as Mimi's—but, like all wood nymphs', they were still a force to be reckoned with. Cassia's had an exceptionally intriguing face, with dark blue, doe eyes and a cute little button nose set neatly above her devious smirk. Her pale, even cappuccino complexion was almost too pleasant, too perfect

And Cassia was always a quick accomplice to Katya's mischief, especially when it involved doling grief out to Mimi. “If only I could push these dusty amanitas in faster. I can't get enough of them. Seems like my belly should have almost maxed out a while ago, but somehow I keep adding more in. I think I'm sleeping on more belly than I have ever had before,” Cassia further concur. She swallowed, and then wrapped her arms around her huge belly, just barely managing to grasp her hands together under its bulk. “I'm totally going to see how much bigger can make it before sleeping on top of it.” Cassia looked at her belly with an overstated look of consideration. “You know, I may not even be able to walk it home tonight. Anyway, it's true, Mimi. You really don't know what you're missing.”

Cassia and Katya both cast their eyes over to Sylvie, as if to solicit her contribution to the fun. Sylvie was still singularly focused on stuffing clumps of yellow fairy rings into her smiling mouth. Her two hands alternated the job of reaching down, then hauling another clump up to her mouth. She was making fast use of another whole harvest basket; Sylvie really didn't need to say anything, anyway. She didn't have to be an active part of Katya's game at all. Her very presence, and her total focus on cramming food down her throat was contribution enough on its own. Because Sylvie always managed to cram a third more food into her belly than the other girls, her gigantic, bulbous belly quite literally spoke mountains toward Katya's cause. It spread her legs apart in a wide V, and covered a broad patch of the floor before it began to curve upward. In the first evening of harvest, Sylvie had managed to pack in a truly amazing variety and amount of the freshly harvest fungi. With more full baskets all around the room, Mimi wondered when Sylvie would stop

Even when not stuffed to the gills, Sylvie was consistently more rubenesque than most wood nymphs. Her plump breasts looked as if they were overfilled, perching like two basketballs attached her frame. Her full hips flared widely from her waist. And yet, her legs were shapely and rather thin, and when not so full of food, Sylvie's fuller curves came to a dramatic narrowing above her hips and below her rib cage. However, what her wide hips did give her was a tremendous, round posterior. All in all, she looked almost like a female caricature

Like Katya's breasts, Sylvie's ass was the envy of all the other girls of the village. The whole town watched it with open admiration when she walked by, and she relished the attention it drew to her. Sylvie's persistent smile caused her eyes to become twinkling crescents as her plump cheeks tightened to allow room for her big grin. As far as brains went, though, even for a nymph, Sylvie was kind of daft. But her happy nature compensated for her lack of wit, giving her a naiveté that was irresistibly cute

Mimi regarded at Sylvie's spherical tummy forlornly. It was so big that that she could probably fit inside of it, Mimi mused to herself. How would that be for a way out? Crawl down Sylvie's throat into her belly, never to have to endure Katya's torture again

As Mimi dejectedly stared at Sylvie's huge belly, Katya made her way on all fours over to Mimi, plowing aside pillows as her belly dragged the floor beneath her. As Katya closed in, Mimi looked up at her with watery eyes

“Oh, what's wrong, Mimi? Not hungry again? That's too bad,” Katya mocked, as she raised herself up from the crawl and put a falsely consoling hand on Mimi's back. Katya pushed out her lower lip as if pouting, her face just inches from Mimi's. Her belly pressed against Mimi heavily, making its invasive presence impossible for Mimi to ignore. “Well, I finished my basket, and I'm almost full now, Mimi. All three of us are almost done,” Katya continued to tease, the sound of Sylvie's unceasing munching notwithstanding

“I think I need just a little more...in....here,” Katya said with a syrupy smile, abruptly pushing her belly even harder against Mimi to indicate where she meant. If there was any doubt before whether she had been using her belly as part of the taunting before, there was no doubt now that she was indeed pressing her belly against Mimi deliberately. She was using it to emphasize a point. Katya was on a roll. Although she had been cruel to Mimi many times before, she never had gotten physical. It wasn't like she was really threatening Mimi, but this new technique...this...'belly aggression'...it upped the psychological effect to a new level

Mimi watched Katya's other hand now reach toward Mimi's basket, still full of morels. She slowly leaned further onto Mimi as she reached. Then, she dug her hand into the basket, and asked with a devilish inflection, “Mind if I have some of yours?” Then she drew a brimming handful up to her mouth and started munching on it while right up in Mimi's face

Something snapped inside of Mimi. “ENOUGH!” she shouted, as she jumped up, pushing aside Katya's belly. Her slender body stamped forward a couple steps and then reeled about to face Katya and the other two

“You do this to me all the time, and I'm sick of it! I'm sorry, but I can't eat!” Mimi glared at the three stunned faces looking at her. “I just can't, okay? And you guys do nothing but make fun of me. I'm sick of it!”

Scene 2: Danger in the Forest
[The management regrets that this scene involves no stuffing. Zero. We will be taking necessary steps to correct this situation in scene 3.]

Why, oh, why couldn't she just eat? Why couldn't she just eat like they could? What was wrong with her? And why did her friends have to be so cruel about this wretched condition of hers? Questions blazed through her mind, briskly swirling around each other in roiling ire as her slippers silently carried her off into the darkness and ever further away from her home.

Where she was heading she didn't know. Sometimes when you are singularly set on getting away from somewhere, where you are going doesn't really matter. The dangers of the night forest were the last thing on her mind. When she had marched off into the fog, she vaguely realized that she was doing something unheard of, but her all-encompassing anger diminished the terrible danger to which she was now subjecting herself. Stuck in a body that made her unable to hold up the second requirement of being a wood nymph, Mimi was now actively defying the first.

Some distance later, Mimi's head started to cool off. She walked underneath the canopy of tall trees far above, where gnarled root systems spread out across the forest floor in twisting and tangled sinews. Fog was condensing to dampen the mossy ground, and her feet were getting cold. The first feelings of uncertainty began to seep into the outer edges of her conscious thoughts.

Shortly, Mimi stopped to rest, sitting on a thick root just before the point where it dove underground once and for all. Her anger had dulled into sullen contemplation. Her sternly frowning lips had softened into something of an noncommittal pouting. The chill of the night was making her shiver, and she started to feel very sorry for herself. As she looked up toward the tree tops hiding in the mist and darkness, a tear slid slowly down her cold cheek, feeling warm at first, but leaving a cold trail of moisture behind it.

Why, oh why, couldn't she eat?

An owl hooted, the sudden sound igniting her sadness into a cold lattice of fear that ran up and out from her spine. She turned her head, wide-eyed, trying to see into the woods around her. With all the fog and no fairy lanterns to light the night, she couldn't see anything, least of all a path home. Nor could she make our from which direction she might have had come. Her shivering was starting to amplify with accumulating fear.

Mimi looked around, realizing that she was utterly lost, and-worse-lost in what was by any account a very frightening forest. The owl hooted again, now sounding closer. She knew that it had probably already heard her. If it caught sight of her, it would be her end. She tried to shrink down into her seat-the root she was sitting on made her feel uncomfortably over exposed.

Then came the sound of something moving in the darkness. Not from above her as she had expected, the sound came from ground level, just beyond one of the larger roots radiating out of the same tree that bore the root on which she was sitting. Panic burst inside her like an unexpected blare of trumpets. With no time to consider what had made the sound, nor think through a best reaction, she sprung up and into flight, dashing away from whatever had made noise. She hurdled over a few clumps of grass, sprinted fast over a short distance, and then vaulted herself over the root of another tree. She bore left and dashed away from this tree's roots for fear of getting trapped in them. Across a clearing she ran, bounding over clumps of grass. Heavy footfalls behind her let her know that she was being pursued.

It was something big-a predator of some kind-not far behind, and gaining. She had mere moments to find some place to hide.
111.title: Mimi ventures into a forest, pondering on why s...

1111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com.

On the other side of the clearing, Mimi tore deeper into the forest as fast as she could run, all the while diverting under small bushes trying to shake off whatever was pursuing her. A voice in her head told her that her only hope would be to run back to her village. But the voice's urgency panicked her, and she could not clearly guess which way would lead her there. She did not have enough time. Cold perspiration further chilled her in the wind. She could hear the horrid beast now bearing down on her. Unable to see well enough in the fog and darkness, she felt each fleeing footfall unsteadily unfold beneath her. To trip and fall would surely mean a horrible death.

Then she saw that she had come to another tree root as it swelled up on her left side. She was running almost parallel to it. She had to be heading toward the tree it came from, as it quickly became too thick for her to jump over.

A moment later, her ultimate misfortune materialized before her as the root suddenly curved upward rapidly into the mist. Her path was closed off at the base of a tree where a similar root came in from, the right, and Mimi was stopped cold. The two roots drew together, forming a big 'V' as they met the tree trunk. Completely cornered, Mimi stopped and reeled around, to face the oncoming charge. In her last moment, she saw an awesome and terrible feline bearing down on her at top speed.

But the cat had not anticipated the sudden appearance of the tree trunk, and was still bounding at top speed. Instinctively, Mimi rolled back onto her backside and twisted her body to roll off to one side. With the cat clumsily trying to stop, her maneuver prevented the cat from crashing directly into her. Instead of crushing her, a stray hind leg knocked her solidly toward the deepest corner the two roots, the very point of the V they formed.

With a heavy thud, the sturdy tree abruptly halted the feline's momentum. Off-balance but unphased, the cat bounced off with a small, twisting aerial that allowed it quickly to recover its balance as well as bring its feet back into control. As it came down, it brought its two front paws, claws extended, down with the deadly and graceful accuracy of a seasoned predator. It landed right on the place where Mimi had just landed.

But, even though it should have been dead on target, it landed on nothing but uneven soil.

The cat immediately felt the mouth of a small hole under its two front claws. The hole at first dropped almost straight down but quickly curved to go under the base of the tree. With almost no delay, the cat jammed a paw deep into the hole, sweeping extended claws like gruesome daggers.

Inside the hole, Mimi had only a moment to recover from her lucky fall before a the backside of the cat's claw knocked her deeper into the hole. The claw swiped back at the spot where she had just been, and then thrust deeper into the hole, coming right at her. She jumped back as it came at her, and now found her back against the dirt at the hole's deepest end. The claw swished horrifyingly closer to her as she squeezed herself against the wall, clutching at exposed roots that poked out of it. To no avail, she tried somehow to pull herself even closer to the back wall and perhaps out of range of her deadly assailant.

A couple sturdy roots hung from the ceiling, allowing Mimi to hoist her torso up toward the ceiling as she walked her feet up the back wall she had pressed up against a moment before. The angle of her position had briefly given her some safety, as the cat's claw swiped just below her now. Already she felt her muscles burning. She had only a short time before her arms would give out. Somehow she had to outlast the interest of the determined cat outside.

Her eyes had adjusted a little to the increased darkness in the hole. She could now see that the hole widened a little bit more than she had noticed. She quickly scanned for corner that might allow her to duck still deeper to better avoid the cat's terrifying and determined claw. Then, to her utter surprise, right below her, she made out the form of a confused little mouse, frozen in terror. How had it managed to avoid the cat's claw this far? The mouse gaped at the claw as it again swiped back and forth, and then the shaking creature looked up at Mimi suspended above him, unsure of anything that was happening in his little hole.

As the mouse's eyes locked on Mimi's, the cat's paw thrust a little deeper. A single claw hooked the mouse by the skin of its belly and yanked back abruptly. The mouse dug in to resist, and for a brief moment, his loose, furry skin was pulled so as to stretch away from one side of the his body as it became tighter around the other. Then the mouse lost grip and was flicked an inch or two forward. The cat was an expert, and quickly used the split-second advantage to sink two more claws into the flesh beneath the mouse's fur. With the better grip, the cat dragged the mouse out of the hole as Mimi watched in terror. The mouse squealed, tearing vainly at the cave walls as the claw dragged him backward. Then, he disappeared up the hole.

Although panic and adrenalin inundated her mind, Mimi still sighed with hesitant relief. She realized that she might have just survived entirely because that mouse had just gone to its death.

Then, a scuffle outside the hole. The mouse, torn and bloody, came scrambling desperately back down into the hole. Mimi gasped in suddenly re-newed horror as, the cat's paw plunged so fast after the mouse that it knocked the mouse forward and against the wall just below where Mimi's feet were starting to lose their hold. The impact's resonance was just enough to tip the scale. Mimi fell, but when she landed, it was not on the mouse, but on the backside of the cat's paw. The cat had buried a few claws back into the mouse, and now it pulled the mouse out so forcefully, that it went directly under her, spinning Mimi around a to land with her back to the floor.

The cat must have felt her. There was no way it couldn't have.

But instead of the claw returning to pull her out too, she heard a crunch that suddenly stopped the mouse's shrill cries, followed by another blood curdling sound of a vertebrae-cracking death-bite. The sound caused a terror in her as though the floor had just given away beneath her. The absolute panic was ringing in her ear as her heart raced unstoppably. Had she heard the cat's footsteps as it trotted away. Had she?

Deep in the hole, Mimi cowered, shaking uncontrollably with fright. Her mind raced as fast as her pounding heart. Her thoughts went over it again and again. She had defied the rule that said never to leave the fairy-lit safety of the village after nightfall. What other terrors would befall her in this terrifying place? With hours to go before dawn would come, each moment passed with agonizing resistance.

After a long while, when she had finally caught her breath, she peeled her terrified eyes away from the mouth of the hole. She slowly scanned the darkness all around her. And then she looked upwards, and her eyes widened with horror renewed. A chill sucked any remaining warmth from her body.

Above her, in the darkness, dozens of glowing eyes of various sizes gazed down at her.
1111.title: Mimi finds a place to hide

Scene 3: Fire in the Hole
[The management is pleased to report that our corrective actions are underway, and there is now at least one creature stuffing its belly in this scene.]

As the scattered flock of Mimi's senses one by one came back to roost, her fear subsided. She looked at the glowing yellow eyes more carefully, and felt growing doubt about what she had originally thought them to be. Perhaps tonight's endless bouts of fear had her on edge, and were now playing on her mind. Whatever the strange, dim lights were, they were much too near to her to be eyes. They were...something else.

She bent forward a little to move her face a little closer, peering into the darkness to try to see exactly what they were. They seemed to bobble and swirl until she focused on one of them. Then, that one didn't move at all—yet all the others around it seemed to swirl like a swarm of tiny fireflies. The overall effect caused Mimi's perception to discombobulate as her eyes completely lost perspective in the twinkling churn.

She closed her eyes and shook her head, bringing the rest of her surroundings back into focus. Mimi drew further in to inspect in close detail. They had a dark outline, a faint, brownish silhouette around them. As she perceived it, it started to take shape, protruding from the wall of the cave. There was familiar structure supporting the tiny yellow lights. Dropping from the ceiling were thick stems, with dome-like caps on them. They were...

“Mushrooms?” wondered Mimi aloud. Hearing her own voice so suddenly startled her a little, but it also soothed her nerves a little. It sounded calmly quizzical.

Now that her senses had assembled the shapes into something recognizable, she could see that indeed they were mushrooms. But they were no kind of mushroom that Mimi had ever seen. Brown with spongy, blue caps? No problem. Thread-like stems with a bright red, round cap that floats away skyward when detached? Everyday occurrence. (In fact they tied them to the handles of their harvest baskets to ease their loads.) Large enough to hollow out and make into a sizable home? Absolutely. Iridescent and making a humming sound? Even that wasn't so peculiar. But a mushroom that grows upside-down on the roof of a cave, and has glowing yellow spots? Unheard of. Preposterous. Unthinkable!

But...there they were, hanging from the ceiling in a small cluster of only a few dozen. Upside down, the fat, round caps looked all wrong to Mimi. Their sturdy stems bent away from each other as if each cap was jostling for elbow room. They were an odd dusky color that made them barely visible in the poor light. And upon them, faintly glowing spots of various sizes seemed to dance about. They were like nothing ever before seen.

Mimi continued to study the peculiar toadstools, gazing into them dreamily with wildly dilated eyes. Why did they hang upside down so? Was it normal for this type of mushroom? And how did they cling from the ceiling like that?

She lifted a hand to brush away some dirt from one of the caps. As she did, a slimy outer film tore away and peeled back. Where it had been now glowed a soft, golden light.

Mimi peeled away some more of the outer layer. Soon the whole cap glowed warmly. Warmly? Yes, it even felt to be radiating a small amount of heat. Was it?

One by one, Mimi peeled away the same dark filmy material from the other mushrooms. It sloughed off readily, and gooey globs fell from Mimi's hands to splat on the floor wetly. With each new cap that Mimi exposed, the dim light illuminated the little mouse hole just a little more until it was as though a lantern hung from the hole's ceiling. The glow warmed the place nicely, and soon Mimi's heavy shivering had completely stopped.

With the chill leaving her bones, so went any residual fear leftover from the horrible incident with the cat. It still shocked her, but she felt relief that it had apparently gone away. Now she had what seemed a warm, relatively safe place to hunker down until the morning came. Her gaze settled back on the dreamily glowing mushrooms as she basked in their warmth. Perhaps the fog would clear, and she could find her way back home.

Soon, Mimi became a touch hungry. At first, she didn't recognize the faint feeling. But as the sensation increased and she realized what it was, she grew skeptical about the feeling's authenticity. Mimi knew that physical exertion sometimes caused her to hunger. When it did she relished the feeling. To feel the deep craving of wanting to eat—to feel it as urgently as any of her friends and other villagers ever did—made her feel like she was...normal. But on these instances, the intense urgency evaporated when she took her first few bites of food. Time and again, all it would turn out to be was just a temporary sensation, a fleeting moment. Still, it was a powerful feeling while it lasted.

“Wow! Am I ever hungry?” she mused to herself. Even if not convinced of its sincerity, She still loved the feeling.

Her eyes re-focused, landing on the glowing mushrooms with a speculative air about them. Her brow furrowed and she mulled her options to herself aloud.

“I really should not eat those. They're keeping it warm in here.” she reasoned to herself. “I have to resist the temptation. It's just hunger, after all. It's not like it takes much to make it go away.”

She thought on it some more.

“But then, if it only takes a little for me to fill myself, then surely I won't eat all of them.”

Thinking it further, she rationalized even more.

“I couldn't eat that many mushrooms, even if I wanted to. It would be no problem for someone like Katya, but I could never.”

Summoning this thought of Katya, brief though it was, caused Mimi's mind to spiral downward like a plane shot out of the sky. She was back to stewing about how harshly Katya had treated her that evening. Katya had even had the nerve to take mushrooms directly from Mimi's basket and munch them right there in Mimi's face! But that whole business of pushing her huge belly onto Mimi while taunting her about how it was so huge, well on that one Katya had gone way over the line. Mimi felt her emotions heating rapidly.

In fact, Katya's actions that evening weren't just playfully teasing anymore. She had been just plain cruel.

“Ooh! When I get back, I'm really going to let her have it,” Mimi said to herself in a harsh whisper.

But, then, what exactly would she do to Katya? She knew she would never really do anything. They were friends. And besides, right now, Mimi mostly just wanted to go home. To see Katya would mean that she had survived her perilous night in the woods. The thought cause her now to long to see Katya's face, despite all the harsh castigations she had expended on Mimi. Still, while Mimi knew that she loved her friend Katya, there was a place in her mind where she still mused about various ways she might serve Katya her just desserts.

As Mimi forlornly stewed about her treatment at the hands of Katya, she absently reached a finger up the the clump of mushrooms and plucked a glowing piece from one. It broke off into her hand with the least of effort. Turning it around for inspection, she absently considered it. It felt almost weightless, yet it seemed solid. It's steady glow also suggested that the material would be seem much more substantial.

Mimi gave it a sniff and paused to consider. She looked to one side, but her expression remained preoccupied with her olfactory evaluation of the queer chunk of mushroom.
11111.title: What are these eyes?

111111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com.
After sniffing it a second time, she delicately nibbled an extremely tiny bit from one small corner.

Instantly, her mouth flooded with a sweet, nutty flavor—just from the one tiny nibble she had taken.

Chomp! Mimi bit into the piece still in her hand, taking at least half of it in this single bite. The delicious taste coated her whole mouth, seeming to permeate its roof, flowing through her teeth, parading triumphantly over her tongue. So intense was the flavor that it felt like it was melding into her. She felt herself become the intense flavor. And as the rush of savory joy slowly abated, she found that her mouth craved more. A lot more.

Put shortly, it was the single most delicious mushroom she had ever tasted.

Swallow. Chomp. Swallow again. The second half of the little piece was gone.

Without the slightest further thought, she grabbed the remainder of the mushroom and steadily munched it down over the next couple minutes, all the while regarding it's potent flavor in deep consideration. No food had ever tasted so good to Mimi ever before. So intense was the taste of this mushroom that she realized that nothing she had ever eaten before had actually ever had any flavor to it at all. Could it be that all this time she had simply been unable to taste any of the food she had eaten? Had she now finally found something that she could taste, something she could eat?

Mimi thought it through as she plucked down another of the scrumptious mushrooms from the ceiling. This time it was a big one, with a thick stem and a broad cap. She wasted little time in gobbling it up.

Reaching to get another one, she realized that there was a problem with her newly formed 'uniquely flavorful' hypothesis. It didn't really make sense. How could it be just these mushrooms that she could taste. She had never seen them anywhere before, so their kind must be extremely rare. And since she had no practical idea of where she was at the moment, how would she ever re-find them again? It was not practical that these were the only mushrooms she could eat. The hypothesis just wouldn't do.

She plucked down another fat toadstool and continued thinking as she rapidly munched it down. She realized that she needed to take into account that after eating one of these big toadstools, she was still hungry. That seemed to need to be factored into her thinking. In fact, after eating two—what was this, her third?—she hardly felt sated at all.

She looked at the half-eaten, third mushroom in her hand. Maybe these mushrooms had somehow cured her? She scarfed the mushroom down in big chunks, greedily gulping down each huge bite.

With one hand she assessed her belly and was thrilled with what she found. Her eyes fell upon her midriff where they found a belly bulging outward pleasantly. The three big mushrooms had swelled her tummy into a nice round curve. Nothing for a normal nymph to write home about, but at least its something, she thought as she pushed an entire fourth mushroom firmly into her mouth. With cheeks bulging she firmly closed her mouth, forcing the overstuffed contents back into her throat in a huge, squishy ball, which is how it slid—bizarrely—down her throat.

Deep satisfaction inundated her, and washed away slowly. A moment later, Mimi started to understand what had just happened. Taken aback by had just transpired, Had she really just swallowed that entire fourth mushroom? Bewildered, Mimi raised her hands to her mouth in frightened amazement.

Her hands were faintly glowing.
She raised them up from her belly and held them before her face. They had a powdery substance all over them, causing them to glow like the mushrooms. They were particularly bright at the fingertips, where the dust was thickest. Her focus shifted to one hand while the other hand reached up to pluck down yet another mushroom and bring it to her lips. This one she munched in steady bites as she stared into her palm's ghostly glow.

She watched her empty palm absently as it reached up for yet another. She watched her her grip fumble, and watched it fall from her hand, tracing its course to the floor like a sunward-bound comet. When the falling mushroom hit the floor, it bounced up in a somersault, spraying a small cloud of glowing spores through the air along it's arching path. Mimi stooped and caught it off the bounce gracefully, despite resistance from her newfound waistline, The trail of spores stirred into a cloud of sparkling, golden chaos. Dazzled by the spectacle, Mimi devoured the mushroom in huge bites, while the twinkling spores slowly settled all around the lower walls and floor of the little hole.

Mimi looked down at her belly again. She had eaten a couple more mushrooms and the effect on her midsection was noticeable. She inhaled with a big smile of delight. “I have a belly!” she said to herself in disbelief, patting the sides of its upper slopes.

Her hands settled on it, palms tracing over the bulging dome's girth, assessing the wonderful contour that protruded out from just below her ribcage, stretched around the mass of glowing mushrooms she had eaten. Her newly-discovered waistline bulged outward, round and proud, as if she had gulped down a big, round ball. It felt wonderful in her hands. Soon, enough powdery spores had rubbed off of her hands onto her belly until it shone with a faint glow of its own.

One hand continued attending to her swelling midsection as she plucked yet another mushroom from the ceiling and ate of it blissfully. As she finished one mushroom, her hands traded places, one reaching up in pursuit of the next mushroom, while the other continued to rub her growing belly.

Pulling down a particularly large one, Mimi thought about the powerful gulp she had used to vanquish the fourth she had eaten. This one now being her tenth, she wondered about trying it again. She crammed the huge thing into her mouth, squishing its spongy body until at last she could start to close her lips around the whole thing. It begrudgingly pushed backward into her throat. Mimi could feel her throat open up for the huge mass, almost as if she had complete control of its steady progress into her esophagus. As it pushed downward into her throat, she gulped powerfully to force it down into her belly. She felt the huge mass stretch her body unnaturally the whole way down. But the swallowing action came so naturally to her that she almost under-appreciated its potential power. The massive gulp now subsided from her throat into her belly, allowing Mimi now to look down and see the last of it now distending her belly outward. To see her belly, already larger than it had ever been, grow even larger right before her eyes caused Mimi to grin ecstatically.

She took a somewhat smaller one and gulped it down the same way. And so, one by one, the mushrooms decreased in number. Within a short period Mimi had made quick work of the entire clump. She gazed at the place on the ceiling from where the mushrooms had once emerged. They were all gone now, and in the faint glow she could not even see the point at which they had been anchored to the ceiling.

Both her hands caressed her belly, assessing the huge curve it now formed. Big as it now was, it was nothing close to the size that Katya's or Cassia's bellies had been. She knew that they would still chide her about it. If only there were more of these delicious mushrooms to eat, she thought.

Watching the faint light on the ceiling shift as her hands moved she realized that something was amiss. If she had eaten all the mushrooms, why was there still this much light? She looked down to where her huge abdomen bulged out from below her shirt to see that her belly was now glowing much brighter than her hands, now casting warm light through her tautly stretched flesh.

Then she noticed that all around her, where earlier she had clumsily scattered scintillating spores about when she had dropped a mushroom, there were mushrooms growing. Wherever the spores had settled, small, dusky colored mushrooms were quickly growing larger. A few already had the glowing spots that she had first thought to be eyes.

Scene 4: A Light Meal

Mimi's hands stopped rubbing her delightfully rounded belly and stared down at the new crop of mushrooms beneath her. The grove spread all around her and the glowing pinpricks pulsed and swam in hypnotic Brownian motion. The bizarre effect quickly caused her to feel dizzy, and she dropped to her knees and paused for a moment. Her head rolled and she could not take her eyes from the wild light show going on around her. Even in the new position she still felt dizzy, so she bent her knees back and lowered herself until she was sitting on her feet and her firmly-packed tummy pressed slightly against the uppermost part of her well-toned thighs.

For a few moments, Mimi continued watching the dazzling display with an unfocused stare. Then her focus came back, both visually and mentally. She realized that she could see the mushrooms actually maturing to full size right before her. They were visibly growing! All around, what had been so many small clumps were popping open their round caps in enlarging bunches, each one jostling the others for space. "Such strange mushrooms these were," she thought to herself vaguely, "growing so quickly."

She reached a hand out and touched one, sloughing off it's filmy outer layer and exposing its bright, warm light. It was such a pleasing revelation that then, almost without thinking about it, her hand gently swept over others, moving as if in slow motion to delicately shed the skin off each one. Soon, her belly was dimmed by comparison, and the hole was completely bathed in their bright glow. There were must have been several dozen of them in the various clumps, and each was now its plump, full size.

For the first time in almost a week, a beautiful smile graced the lines of Mimi's darling face. Dimples formed in her cheeks and her eyes became down-turned crescents of joy. Her nicely rounded belly full of mushrooms warmed her pleasantly, but her appetite had in no way abated. She reveled with the thought that these clumps of newly-grown, beautiful mushrooms that were all around her feet were hers to enjoy all alone. They were going to go to a very good cause.

Mimi beamed back at her luminous little bulge. With the mass of mushrooms solidly packed inside it, it swelled Mimi's waistline further out than it ever had ever been. True, it was still nowhere even close to the huge tummy Katya had so aggressively pressed against Mimi just a few hours before...but Mimi finally felt the wonderful sensation that her friends were always going on about. A well rounded belly really did feel good! She even felt the rush of pride that her girlfriends seem to always get over having their bellies crammed so full, and this made her smile even more.

But the smile started weakened as she thought again about how much bigger Katya's belly really had been. Mimi knew that her belly was really not that large...not at all. Her envious thoughts quickly turned to disparage herself for taking pride in what was really such a minuscule tummy bulge. If Katya were there, she would laugh at it, and maybe even start to devour Mimi's hard-won trove of mysterious fungi. She would eat every last one of these mushrooms, stuffing herself to twice Mimi's current size in no time. The thought played so vividly in Mimi's mind that she could almost hear Katya's voice mocking her.

"You call that a full belly? As if! That's more like a just-had-a-couple-appetizers-before-dinner belly, if you asked me. Now this!" And Mimi envisioned Katya patting her enormously stuffed abdomen with overbearing pride. "This...is a belly! See how it pushes outward from directly below my ribcage?" Katya cupped her hands over her huge breasts, squashing them a little as she lifted, and then tapped the top of her belly twice with an extended left pinky, calling attention to how it came out of her torso almost perpendicularly, forming a huge, curved shelf. "See how wide it swells out on either side?" And her hands flew to the sides of her belly, allowing her breasts to settle heavily back into position. She squeezed her huge tummy as she swayed it from side to side so Mimi could fully appreciate its broad proportions. "And I couldn't even think about having my knees together while sitting on my feet like that, Mimi. Let's face it, you're just no good at stuffing. You could never stuff yourself like this!"

This time for emphasis, Katya pushed her monstrous tummy way out, and Mimi saw that Katya's belly was so large that its huge mass was forcing her her spine to arch backward slightly. Katya had eaten so much that it was contorting the very mechanics of her body. She must have had devoured several pounds of Mimi's special mushrooms to get this way. Indeed, Katya's enormous belly was glowing brightly. Her hands were dusted heavily with their bright spores, and all around her sexy, full lips, Katya's face was covered in the luminescent dust.

Mimi clenched her jaw defiantly. "No!"

The vision of Katya evaporated in an instant and Mimi was back in the mushroom-filled hole. Determination cleared her fogged mind. The only way ever to get Katya to back down would be to match her pound for pound, inch for inch. Mimi knew that she would somehow have to do it. She surveyed the crowded floor again. All around her were the clumps of fat, glowing mushrooms. Could she eat many more of them? Could she eat all of them? It was time to find out.

She bent over, spreading her knees to apart as she did to allow her little belly to push between her long slender legs. Then she quickly snatched one, then another. Her right hand raced the first toward her face, pushing the first deep into her mouth where her throat could swallow it down with the same powerful gulp as before. The second followed immediately after.

Becoming frantic, she gobbled down the other six in the cluster, gulping them down in rapid succession. Feeling desperate to eat them in case Katya really arrived, she quickly started on the next clump, sometimes slowing into just taking huge bites so that she could briefly gasp for breath between the humongous swallowing feats that she was performing. As each one pushed its way into her belly, the girth of her bulbous middle pushed her legs a little further apart.

Finishing one, she moved to the next clump and started working it in twos. Each pair disappeared in quick succession, as Mimi quickly power-swallowed them all down. Her belly increased in time with each gulp, growing quickly enough that she soon felt it pressing against the floor as she crawled on hands and wide-spread knees over to the next big bunch of her delicious prey.

She ate so ravenously that she could not keep track of how many mushrooms she had gulped down in this clump. One. Two. Three, four. Five-six-seven. Then she realized that she had packed two of them into her mouth at once. Her cheeks bulged as she tried to chew them at least a little before gulping them down.

Her predicament made her pause uncertainly only for a moment. She sat up again, knees pushed apart now by a much, much larger mass of tummy. Then, she mustered her strength, pulled in her cheeks and swallowed as hard as she could. The huge mass felt as though it would rip her open as she strained to force the whole wad of it all down her throat at once. It pained her as her neck thickened bizarrely with its mass. The tight pressure of passing through her throat caused the mass to elongated as the mass progressed through her esophagus. It pushed into her belly just as the other end passed through her tonsils into her distended throat. As soon as she could move her chin, she looked down to her brightly glowing belly as the new mass increased its already huge diameter.

"Uuuuhhhhh," Mimi sighed deeply, panting and trying to get her breath for several seconds. When the pain of the act subsided, she looked down at the huge belly and a thrill came over her. No one from the village would ever believe it was her. She had never eaten like this before. Never had she gotten her belly to such respectable dimensions. It felt...amazing.

Even with her knees this wide apart, holding as best she could the same position in which she had sat when feeling dizzy, her belly now dominated her lap so completely that she could not see her thighs under it. It swelled out from below her over-sized breasts magnificently, like a big, glowing balloon. It swelled a little more as she absentmindedly finished swallowing another mushroom that she had casually picked up from the same clump she had last been working on. Was that nine or ten, then?

Mimi ran a hand down the perimeter of her belly, this time assessing it with purpose. It was still not as big as Katya's. Close...but in this game, close meant nothing. Mimi eyed the remaining clumps of mushrooms deviously. While perhaps some concern over her newfound appetite was warranted, she knew that if these were the only kind of mushroom she could eat, then this might be the one and only chance to ever match Katya.
1111111.title: Eat more?

11111111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com.

Aiming toward the next clump, Mimi leaned forward, dropping back onto her hands and knees. Her belly pressed heavily into the ground beneath her, pressing her huge bosom up toward her glowing chin. She straightened her arms, relieving the pressure, but found that her her arms and knees were almost not long enough any more, and her belly rubbed on the floor awkwardly as she did. Mimi brought her pretty face down toward the next somewhat smaller clump, causing her mane of chestnut hair to drape around it. Up close to the mushrooms' glow, her green eyes glowed with fiery zeal. She eased her weight from one arm, allowing her belly to support her. Now that her hand was free, it began hauling lovely mushrooms into her voracious mouth. In moments the whole clump was no more.

The next clump was somewhat larger than the last-maybe eleven or twelve healthy specimens-but it was no match for a wood nymph on a mushroom binge. Moments later Mimi turned to the final clump. It was back behind her, and her belly now resisted her efforts at locomotion. To move at all, she had to extend her knees slightly and push off with her feet a little while holding her arms straight, scooting her giant gut in little frog-like hops. But Mimi relished the extra effort, remembering how Katya sometimes would fill herself until she could not even move for a day or two.

The final clump was quickly gone, too, with its mass now contributing to Mimi's tremendous girth. Exhausted, Mimi tried to roll onto her back to rest, but found that when she tried, she was stopped short by the walls of the hole. The obstruction's abrupt halt left her laying on her side, with her thin brow line furrowed in momentary frustration.

Her frustration turned quickly into curiosity when she noticed that this position allowed her to look up the passage by which she had fallen into the hole, it's dark channel leading up and out into the fearsome night. She could see that it narrowed a bit as it curved upward. No light came in from outside yet, though, so she still could not leave her safe little haven. Studying the path by which she would have to make her eventual exit, she noticed the familiar swirling pinpricks of light. There, lining part of the passage out, she had somehow missed five or six bulging clumps of large, succulent mushrooms.

She wondered how she could have missed them. Perhaps their faint glow had been overwhelmed by the brightness of so many exposed clumps below. Or, maybe by her belly, which was only now beginning to dim. She shimmied herself toward them, squirming into a position that sat her so that she was slightly reclined from upright, her back against the inclined dirt wall and her head pushed into the narrowing tunnel. The top of her belly lightly brushed against the sides of the hole below her. Somewhere down there, she felt its girth spreading her bent knees far apart, pushing them against the soft soil on either side.

Now closer to her most recently discovered mushrooms, Mimi's heavy-lidded green eyes watched the tiny lights madly spinning around. She fell into a warm, sated, deep trance. Her thoughts slowed and became ethereal. Her mind was soaked in a singular thought: "beauty..." Absently, she reached out her hand and slowly peeled away their slick outer skin.

The swirling lights now gone, bright caps glowed before her. She still felt hungry, but also felt deep exhaustion. Mimi began munching down these last four big bunches much more slowly, almost drifting into sleep as she ate them, taking actual bites for once, and struggling a bit to swallow. As she progressed through them, she could feel the irregularly shaped dirt walls of the hole below her press against her belly more snugly. Still she continued drowsily munching away.

By the time she finished the last of the last, sleep was upon her. The tight walls hugging her belly now held her fast in place. She wedged a hand under one of her breasts-which seemed now even larger, and rounder-and caressed her the top of her bulbous tummy from where it pushed out from her torso to the point where it met snugly with the wall of the hole. It was now very, very large. Maybe as large as Katya's? Maybe, or maybe not...but it sure felt good

"Mmmmmm....I'm still pretty hungry," Mimi mused aloud in a dreamy-sounding whisper. "What do you think of that, Katya?" Shortly thereafter, Mimi drifted off into sleep.

111111111.content:
