Scene 5: A Meal on the Way Home

When Mimi awoke, she could see pale light at the mouth of the hole. Despite having stuffed herself like never before, she was pleased to find that she still felt hungry. Extremely hungry, in fact. Grabbing a protruding root, she tried to pull herself toward the hole's mouth and daylight. She wriggled with effort, towing herself forward and feeling the cave walls snugly squeeze the girth of her belly as she pulled.

Mimi's mane of chestnut hair finally poked up out of the hole, and she saw the giant tree's buttressing roots radiating outward from the trunk as they became shorter and shorter until finally they submerged into the humus of the forest floor. The air was still somewhat chilly, but the fog was much thinner and the day felt as if the sun would burn through at any moment. Seeing this brightening world warmed Mimi and she smiled broadly. It felt so much safer than the night before, and inside her bloomed a confidence that she would find her way back home.

She wriggled forward, pulling up with her arms until her shoulders appeared. Then she adjusted and squared her elbows in order to she pushed against the ground, bringing her ample busom into view. Then her belly began to emerge from the constraining tunnel. It to bulged outward from the mouth of the hole, rounding as more and more of it came out. It had stopped glowing, but it was far larger than when Mimi had last seen it.

When she got about half way out, her girth would not allow her arms any more leverage, which momentarily stopped her progress. Somewhere in the hole below her, Mimi's strong legs scrambled to find a purchase. Pushing off of the walls rhythmically, she rocked first left, then right, and eventually shimmied the rest of her hulking abdomen out from its confines. When she popped free, she collapsed backward, feeling overexerted. Her legs were bent at the knees, still dangling into the hole. Her huge belly, swollen like she was some kind of comical balloon, pushed down the waistband of her forest green trousers and rose up from her hips to form a great dome. Up to its apex at her navel it rose, and then sloped steeply back down to meet the base of her ribcage. Her moss-colored half-shirt seemed to stretch more tightly over her perfectly rounded bosom, heaving with exhaustion. As she slowly caught her breath, her belly moved with the rhythm of her panting.

“Ugh...so tired,” Mimi moaned, feeling the weight of her belly shift pleasantly with her sigh.

“So...hungry, too,” Mimi marveled to herself. She looked down at her huge abdomen, surveying its swell with newfound delight. “Oh, Katya, you aren't going to believe this!” Mimi beamed her brilliant smile, white teeth gleaming in the morning light. She felt eager to get back home and show off her huge belly, perhaps fill it even further just to prove that she was at long last okay.

“I'm still hungry!” she cheered happily, as she swung her feet out of the hole, rolled onto her belly and planted her feet on the firm ground. Bent over her massive belly, she used her arms to push her shoulders away from the ground. She spread her legs around her belly as it shifted beneath her and she leaned back into a squat. Finally she heaved herself up over her feet and stood. She did it all in a quick, fluid motion. For some reason, it came to her perfectly naturally, even though she had only seen it done by her happily gorged friends.

Now standing with a slight backward tilt to counterbalance the cantilevered bulge before her, she mused that her belly might just be as rotund as any wood nymph's had ever been. This thought filled her heart with joy and a deep satisfaction. The fullness of it—its bulge completely eclipsing her legs below—caused Mimi no end of pleasure as she took her first step and felt its weight shift with her.

At first, walking while like this felt very foreign to her—a strangely disconnected experience. She could see the ground a little way before her, but she had no hope of seeing her feet. Each step required some faith that the ground she was stepping over was the same as she had seen a moment before. Soon she was moving along with a sprightly step, making her way back into the forest, an adventurous and well-stuffed wood nymph heading for home.

Her path took her beneath gigantic, gnarled trees that imposed ominous, dark shade in the morning light. Mimi pressed on, seemingly unconcerned about their imposing gloom. Her mind was on other things, her hawkish eyes scanning for a small grove of mushrooms, or whatever else could slake the growing hunger in her belly.

“I'm going to need more than just a couple mushrooms,” she said to herself as her belly growled audibly. “Morels would be delicious,” she thought. Shitakes...now that was an absolutely scrumptious proposition. “I just want to eat and eat,” Mimi thought to herself as she lumbered along. “Katya, you're really never going to believe how much I can eat. I'll just have to show you.”

Off Mimi wandered, uncertain of which way to go or what time it was. She simply continued going downhill, remembering that when she stormed off from her village, she had kept going up. So down it was, through intermittent forest and glade. Over the course of a few hours, Mimi's belly compacted and tightened as she walked along, making the going progressively easier. This was, of course, a natural and necessary adaptation that all wood nymphs shared. Because they had to consume so much, their full bellies would naturally contract, increasing the density of their contents so that still more could be packed in. Soon Mimi's belly had contracted to a much more manageable size, causing Mimi to worry that it now appeared somewhat smaller than the size of Katya's the night before.

In a short while, the trees thinned and eventually nearly disappeared completely as sparse grass began to take over. Then the grass thickened and the trail became faint, eventually disappearing altogether into a broad grassy meadow opening up into a broad valley. Almost as if on cue, the last wisps of fog burned away and the sun shone brightly on the grass, glistening with dew.

The valley seemed vaguely familiar, and soon Mimi recognized where she was. It was one of the more distant spots where she and her friends occasionally went when harvesting closer to their village proved unfruitful. As the familiarity became certain, Mimi felt a thrill run through her. Although she was still a long way from home, at last she knew quite well where she was. “Home!” Mimi thought as her excitement grew. Soon she would see her friends, and might even find something to eat along the way. Setting course for home, her pace quickened and down the valley she went.

A thought struck her, and she slowed abruptly. Remnants of last night's anger overtook her mind, as she remembered the grudge she bore. “On second thought, I absolutely have to find more to eat before I get back home. There's no way I can go home like this,” she said looking at her now-much-smaller belly with mild disgust. “This tummy has to be bigger than Katya's when I get back. I'll show her who can stuff herself!” Her tummy agreed with a sudden rumble. She continued at a slower pace down the valley, now scanning for a grove of mushrooms to devour before her homecoming.
111111111.title: She wakes up

1111111111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com.
Finally, off in the distance and much lower in the valley, just where a lone pair of evergreens reached their great bows skyward, Mimi saw something moving. It was another wood nymph, and she was harvesting mushrooms under the trees. And even though Mimi could not tell who it was yet, but she could see that whoever it was had something she wanted: some very full baskets of mushrooms.

Mimi bounded ahead, mouth watering with anticipation as her belly and breasts bounced heavily with her long strides. Who it was harvesting way out here mattered little to Mimi. She was going to eat every last morsel in those baskets.

As Mimi drew near, the busy nymph heard her approach and stood up from her stooped position. She turned to face Mimi, still holding a big, spongy clump of morels in one hand. The nymph was a quite small, with a slender frame. From an orange sun hat, straight, sandy-blond hair hung down to her shoulders, and watery-blue eyes opened wide with happy surprise as they recognized Mimi. Mimi recognized her, too. It was Missy, a diminutive little nymph that Mimi knew fairly well, although they were from different circles of friends. Missy was always very friendly, outgoing and cheerful, even if she was a little naïve (even for a nymph).

“There you are, Mimi! Everyone's been looking for you. Thank goodness you're okay!” Missy then realized that having a hugely bulging tummy was a first for Mimi. “And look at you! You're finally eating!” Missy said cheerfully.

Mimi felt like that last part about “finally eating” was unnecessary, but she held her tongue out of interest in the mushrooms Missy had collected.

“And, wow! That belly looks pretty full!” she said with a sing-song lilt as she stuck her own well-rounded belly outward and patted it to punctuate her statement. Tiny little Missy was so small that the orb her belly formed was but maybe a quarter the size of Mimi's.

Mimi drew up right before Missy, nearly bumping her with her big, protruding gut. Mimi stood a whole head taller than Missy, but Missy did not look up to Mimi's face. She was too busy gawking at Mimi's impressive belly. It wasn't that Missy had never seen one so large, it was just she had never seen Mimi with one at all. It heaved with Mimi's heavy breaths as Mimi cocked her head and leaned to one side to get a fuller view.

“But not quite full enough, Missy,” Mimi replied, proudly rubbing her hands over her big belly to emphasize it's size. “I finally found my appetite...” she explained.

“Well, I guess you did,” Missy agreed. “We were all so worried about you. Let's get you back to the village so others will stop looking.”

“Okay, but can we first eat something, Missy. I'm so hungry!” Mimi said urgently, snatching the morels from Missy's hand and chomping off half the clump with a voracious bite.

“Okay!” Missy said with playful enthusiasm. “I have about four baskets of morels here. I need to get most of them back to—” Missy was cut short by Mimi diving into the first of them with both hands, grabbing up big clumps and hauling them up to her mouth as she fell to her knees. With her belly pressed to the ground, Mimi proceeded to devour the mushrooms, barely chewing before gulping them down.

“Mmmmfff...so hungry...” Mimi explained.

“I can tell!” Missy said, stepping over to the same basket.

Mimi was ecstatic. Sure enough, the morels were every bit as delicious as she had always wanted them to be. Their taste compelled her onward. She craved them with a ferocity that she had never even dreamed of having for food. Down they went in such rapid gulps that it seemed that just one basket might not be enough.

Missy reached in and pulled out a morel for herself. She ate it slowly as she watched Mimi devour the basket at an alarming rate. “I hope it's okay if I take it easy,” Missy said. “I just ate a little while ago,” she explained as she absently stroked her much smaller belly. Soon, the basket was empty, all of it stuffed into Mimi's big gut save for the clump of morels that Missy still nibbled gingerly.

“Wow, Mimi, you really did find your appetite! That was amazing!” Missy told her as she stepped to another basket a few feet away. “Let me get you some more.”

Missy used two hands to lift the heavy basket by its handles, and then waddled with her burden over to Mimi. Still on her knees, Mimi dove in before Missy could set it down, using one hand to rake mushrooms from the top of the basket into her mouth, then swallowing them down as fast as they came at her. Mimi's other hand pushed the underside of the basket so that it tilted toward and kept Missy from being able to setting it down. Missy held the basket there as Mimi greedily gulped down huge mouthfuls, hardly even chewing the delicious morels.

As the basket lightened in her arms, Missy tilted it further and watched in amazement as Mimi continued to pull more and more toward herself. Instead of slowing as her belly became more full, Mimi seemed to eat faster and faster, working her mouth around the bigger clumps and gulping them down whole. When the basket was almost half empty, Mimi leaned back on her bent knees, pulling the basket it toward her as her growing belly pushed outward beneath it. Now sitting sitting on her feet, Mimi leaned back and allowed her belly to support the basket which was now listing nearly to horizontal. Missy could now balance the basket with one hand, so she used the other to help supply more morels from the bottom of the basket to Mimi's endlessly hungry mouth.

Mimi gave up and allowed Missy to feed her altogether. She leaned further back so that the the basket tilted more and more, until she had to put her arms on the ground behind her to support herself. In this relaxed position and with Missy at her service, she could concentrate on her feeding technique. She gulped the delicious morels as fast as Missy could get them to her.

When it came down the last big clump of morels, Missy picked it up and held it before Mimi for a moment. The empty basket fell to the ground while Missy turned her pretty face slightly sideways and gave Mimi a playfully stern look.

“Okay, Mimi, that's it. I want to bring at least two baskets home.” Then Missy took the last morel clump and delicately pushed it into Mimi's waiting mouth. Mimi's lips closed around it more quickly than Missy had expected. The tips of two of her fingers hit Mimi's tonge and were momentarily closed in. Missy snapped her hand back quickly, pulling from Mimi's mouth just as Mimi gulped the big clump down.

“Whoa, Mimi! Don't eat my fingers, too!” Missy said with a smile.

Mimi's eyes flashed with realization. As delicious as the morels were, that other flavor she had just tasted was nothing short of heavenly. That was Missy's fingers? Her belly rumbled again, but it wasn't morels it wanted. “Finally eating, indeed,” thought Mimi. A wicked inspiration struck her.

“Can't I have just one more basket, Missy? Please? I'll help you collect another.”

“You're still hungry, Mimi? Seriously!?” Missy was looking at the huge belly bulging before her. It pushed Mimi's knees apart at a right angle to each other and pressed upon the ground heavily. Missy wondered whether Mimi would even be able to walk. “You're positively huge. Can't you wait until we get back to the village?”

“No,” said Mimi, forlornly looking at the ground beside her. “I'm finally hungry. What if it goes away and I don't ever get hungry again?”

“Well, I don't know if that's really going to be a problem for you, Mimi,” Missy said, leaning forward and chiding Mimi by giving her massive belly a light pat. Mimi's mouth watered at Missy's touch. It was all she could do to keep herself from pouncing on and devouring slender little Missy and her bulbous tummy, but she knew that she had to play this one right.

“Come on, Missy. I'm sooo hungry,” Mimi whined. As if on cue, her belly tremored with a loud growl.

“Wow! You really are hungry. Who ever knew that you would get so good at stuffing yourself?” Missy said. “Anyway, why not? But you have to help me re-fill two baskets, Mimi. Okay?”

“Of course,” Mimi lied.

Missy pranced over to the third basket, then hauled it slowly back over to Mimi. Together, they hoisted it up onto Mimi's belly, and then Missy once again began stuffing morels from it into Mimi's gleeful mouth.

Missy she mused aloud to Mimi: “I'm so glad you're alright, Mimi. Where were you anyway?”

“Mmmmffff...more please...” Mimi said without answering.

“Oh, yeah, sorry. I won't make you talk while you're eating,” Missy said. She started stuffing Mimi's mouth with greater quantity of morels.

>chomp< >gulp<

“I can see why you got so upset. I've never seen Katya so full before. She must have really overdone it, huh? But you can't blame her for being hungry just because you're not, you know?” Missy giggled a little, feeding Mimi yet another big clump. Two thirds of the basket's contents were gone already. “But you sure are hungry now, huh?”

>chomp< >chomp< >gulp<

“How do you swallow so much at once, anyway?” Missy asked as she stuffed Mimi's mouth full again.

>gulp<

Mimi drew a breath.

“I'm not sure,” said Mimi. “Let's see how much I can gulp at once, okay?”
1111111111.title: She meets another wood nymph

11111111111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com.
“Sure, you tell me when,” Missy replied.

With a quarter of the basket left to go, Missy started packing Mimi's mouth with morels. Soon Mimi's cheeks were bulging out and she could not quite close her lips.

“How's that? Enough?” Missy asked.

Mimi shook her head slightly, and Missy started to pack some more in causing Mimi's cheeks to bulge out freakishly. They continued to stretch as Missy stuffed still more in.

“I don't think I can fit any more” she reported.

Mimi shook her head again, then lifted a hand from the ground and sharply pointed a finger inside the basket twice. Then she pointed at her mouth and gave the same indicating double-point. Her meaning was clear: she wanted all of it.

Missy set to work, pushing another clump into Mimi's over-stuffed mouth. She pressed down hard, but there was simply no more room to pack it into. Then suddenly something happened to yield now plenty of space. Somehow, Mimi's jaw had come unhinged and dropped wide open, allowing Missy to pack in a whole lot more. Once again she pushed in huge handfuls until Mimi's mouth seemed full. As Missy crammed in more and more, Mimi's mouth still did not become full. Finally, Missy managed to stuff the very last clump from the basket into Mimi's massively overstuffed mouth and then leaned back to examine her work.

It was only then that Missy noticed that the mass of mushrooms had sunk down past the back of Mimi's mouth and into her throat. There, it caused her neck to bulge ominously. Between her unhinged jaw, tightly packed cheeks, and swollen neck, Mimi's head was strangely distorted. The mass of morels were constrained, roughly, to the shape of an upside-down pear, and it pushed the top of her head back so that her mouth pointed skyward.

Mimi slowly worked the mass in her mouth so that she could close her lips as the astonished Missy ran her fingers lightly around the mass in Mimi's neck in disbelief. Her fingers traced upward until she reached Mimi's face, and then cupped her hands with widespread fingers around Mimi's cheeks, assessing the incredible perimeter of their contents.

“You really can swallow all that?” Missy asked in a whisper. Mimi thought about it uncertainly. They would soon know.

Mimi took Missy's wrists in her hands and held Missy's hands in place on her cheeks. Then, Mimi gulped suddenly. The massive load was sucked down from her cheeks, stretching its way through her throat until it entered her belly and swelled it outward measurably. Still holding Missy's wrists, Mimi's face was back to its normal, cherubic loveliness. Missy's delicate, pale fingers still pressed against her olive-colored cheeks.

Mimi replied, “Yep,” as if it had been no effort at all.

Missy was dumbstruck by the seemingly impossible feat that she had just witnessed. Her mouth hung open and her baby-blue eyes were like saucers. Mimi took the opportunity to put some of the fingertips of Missy's left hand into her mouth. They tasted even more wonderful than before. Missy stared at her fingers as they passed through Mimi's lips and into her incredible mouth. She inserted her other hand to explore its wonders, as Mimi's tongue circled round the fingers of the first. Missy tasted so...so...so Missy. Wanting more, Mimi pressed Missy's fingers deeper and the flavor intensified.

“How much more could you have swallowed?” Missy asked, her voice distant with wonder.

Mimi pulled Missy's hands out momentarily. “You taste so good!” Then she pushed Missy's whole hands into her mouth.

“Mimi, what are you doing?” Missy asked with a slow realization that her hands might not be in so safe a place.

Mimi's teeth clamped down on Missy's hands firmly, and she grinned at Missy wickedly.

“Mimi! Stop it!” Missy exclaimed, suddenly becoming worried. “Let go of me!”

With her mouth full of Missy's hands, it was hard but Missy understood the response: “I can't. You taste so good.”

“Mimi! Cut it out!” cried Missy, trying to pull hands free.

Suddenly, Mimi shoved Missy's hand deep into the back of her mouth, pressing them down into her throat. Feeling her wrists suddenly bound together by Mimi's throat, Missy inhaled in horror. Just as she started to struggle in panic, she felt Mimi's throat contract and a powerful suction wrenched her arms downward into Mimi's mouth. When she looked again, Mimi's lips were stretched around her elbows

Missy gasped with pain, feeling her arms wrenched uncomfortably together. Blood-shot terror filled her blue eyes, and tears began to stream down her cheek. She wanted to use her legs to leverage herself free, but Mimi was hauling her up over that huge belly. It was all happening so quickly—she could only kick her legs as they trailed behind her. Her struggles only caused her sun hat to fall off of her head.

Now Mimi's hands grabbed her shoulders and pulled her forward, as her throat contracted yet again. Suction pulled her arms down, and she felt her hands press into the soft and spongy mushrooms in Mimi's giant belly. Mimi's lips were sliding mercilessly toward her shoulders. Next Missy felt Mimi's hands on the back of her head and press her face down between her upper arms. Her legs kicked wildly as she felt the next gulp tow her hopelessly inward. Something wet and fleshy probed up from between her arms, licking her face. Then it was teasing over her neck and down her chest as she plunged down into Mimi's huge belly.

Sliding through the tight clutch of Mimi's throat, Missy wondered whether Mimi could really swallow her whole. Could Mimi actually swallow the bulge of her fully stuffed tummy? And how big would Mimi be when she was done?

With Missy now entering her belly, Mimi rolled herself forward and continued to power-swallow Missy into her belly in lurching gulps, her tongue lapping every delicious inch of Missy that passed over it. She could feel Missy's shoulders reaching her belly now, and the stretching from the added mass felt fantastic. But she faced something of a problem: Mimi's lips had reached Missy's bulging belly, and she was uncertain about whether she could handle the huge girth.

GULP!

Nothing. Missy's progress had stopped. Her panicked legs still flailed a bit, but the strength of her kicks had faded considerably.

GUULP!!!

Still nothing. Mimi's reached forward and grabbed the waistband of Missy's trousers. The blue satin was hard to grip at first, but soon she managed to wrap it around her hands. This time she pulled with all her might and swallowed as hard as she could.

GUUUUULPP!!!

Mimi's arms bent at the elbows as she pulled Missy into her mouth. Missy's big abdomen squeezed through Mimi's lips and into er mouth, stretching it so wide that it hurt. But forward Missy did go, her belly elongating as it pressed its way through Mimi's throat. Finally, when the upper part of Missy's belly squeezed through the compressed narrow passage into Mimi's belly, the difference in pressure suddenly caused the contents of Missy's lower belly to flow forward, rapidly towing the lower half of her belly into Mimi's. Missy's legs, which had mostly stopped kicking, followed effortlessly.

Already enormous from having Missy's arms, head, shoulders and chest enter it, Mimi's belly swelled outward with the addition of Mimi's legs and plump sphere of a belly. The feeling of becoming so enormous washed Mimi in waves of delight. Stretching out before her in a huge sphere, her belly was way far beyond any size she had achieved before. Missy had been every bit as delicious as Mimi had imagined.

Catching her breath, Mimi dropped to her side to lay on the grass. Her huge, round belly sprawled before her, rocking and undulating as Missy vainly struggled inside. It felt wonderful. Mimi knew only one wood nymph to have ever consumed so much. Once, after one of her biggest binges, Sylvie had achieved a belly bigger than Mimi's was now, but Sylvie was much bigger than Mimi all around.

Mimi noticed something else novel about her belly's immensity: her torso must have stretched longer in order to accommodate her belly's absurd breadth. Somewhere inside her, Missy squirmed again.

“Mmmm! Missy,” sighed Mimi, “You were much tastier than any of those mushrooms you had picked.” She gave her belly a friendly pat, and said, “Here's to 'finally eating,' Missy.”

Mimi basked there in the mid-day sunshine, periodically snacking on the final basket of morels as she stroked her hugely overstretched abdomen and enjoyed the occasional squirms and shudders deep inside of it.

Scene 6: Perambelliation
Some minutes later, the commotion in Mimi's gigantic belly finally calmed. Mimi stretched lazily where she lay, extending her arms up above her head and pointing her delicate toes so that the toned contours of her legs expressed themselves appealingly. The arching of her back elongated her belly, too, extending her length a bit. As she relaxed out of the stretch, Mimi could sense the distance her belly had added between her head and toes.

When she sat up, Mimi found it was an almost effortless action despite that her belly looked like it would be an immobilizing burden. Its mass splayed her straightened legs apart in a wide angle asserting its huge bulk between them. Mimi looked around herself for a moment and considered the effects of such a huge belly. Sitting like this, her head was nearly at the same level as her pre-belly height when standing up. She felt the olive-toned globe of belly cinching tighter around on its contents, pressing them inward to compact them even more densely. As it did so, it became firmer, and it tightened slightly more at its midsection, which further added to Mimi's newfound height.

Enjoying the sensation of her belly's dynamic changes, she went on to discover that she even had some control over its contractions. She started to sense that she might have muscles that she could somehow control voluntarily. She tried to flex with a contraction and found that her belly tightened more in the middle, raising the altitude of her head a bit. Then as she relaxed, her belly bulged back out in the middle, bringing her height back down slightly.

This was something fun and new. Belly muscles?! She squeezed again—harder this time—and managed to increase the effect. Now she was intrigued. She squeezed again, and released suddenly. As the the huge mass insider her belly dropped heavily back down, she flexed a different way, forcing the mass of all those mushrooms and Missy downward. Her belly bulged outward all around her as it squished down and flattened slightly. When the surface tension of her belly began pulling her belly back to a sphere shape, Mimi flexed yet again, squeezing her belly's middle as hard as she could so that it became longer and taller than the last time. She released yet again, bearing down with the opposite muscles, and causing her heavy belly to flatten enough that it covered her knees and pressed to the ground on the outside of both of her outstretched thighs before snapping back to round again.

Mimi was amazed: she could control her belly! It must have been why it had been so easy for her to sit up. Her belly was beginning to respond to her as naturally as her arms or legs did. Even though its mass was so ponderous, she no longer needed to concern herself with it making her immobile. With this newfound ability, she could shift her weight weight with ease, allowing her to manipulate her hugely gravid body as she needed.

She squeezed and released several times in succession, now. She found the right rhythm for her contractions, and soon she had the whole mass of her belly sloshing up and down. It was still firmly on the ground, but soon she was able to move its mass so well that it became as natural as bouncing a ball.

With her belly rising and falling like this, Mimi decided she would try to stand up. As her belly rose, she bent her knees and planted her feet firmly on the ground. But the weight of her descending belly flattened her legs back to the ground heavily.

Mimi stopped heaving her belly for a moment, and as it sloshed to a firm stop, she thought briefly. Then, a knowing smirk crossed her pretty face and she set her jaw. A look of cool resolve settled into her smoldering green eyes. Wrinkling her nose with the effort, she squeezed her belly tall again, then squeezed it squat again, and quickly got the rhythm back.

This time, just as she started to heave upward again, she leaned forward, quickly positioning toned legs so that they bent tightly at the knees with her feet planted squarely under her center of gravity. Not allowing her belly to come back down again, she straightened her legs and raised her huge mass until she stood upright. Unsure why all that weight was so easy for her little legs to lift, she now stood, although hardly upright.

The bulk of her belly forced her to lean back awkwardly in order to keep her balance. The leaning made it so that her belly's weight felt unsteady, as if it would suddenly fall to one side or the other. She tried to steady her massive abdomen by placing a hand on either curved outer wall of her monstrous tummy, but the added support did little to help her stabilize. There was no way she could walk home like this.

Mimi looked around her a bit. She spied Missy's collection baskets, all empty and cast about the grass careless. Missy had brought four baskets out harvesting with her, and didn't even think to take a push cart for getting them home again, Mimi thought. That silly, delicious little girl! Still, a tiny cart likely would not have helped Mimi's predicament much. Her arms would not be long enough to lift the handles of a cart loaded with this behemoth belly in it.

Mimi's mind wandered into considering her situation a little more completely. She was still hours away from home, and the midday sun was steadily progressing across the sky, escorting noontime along and bringing with it the mid-afternoon. Shadows had begun to come out from under the trees, creeping ever so slightly eastward. The warmth of the afternoon had set cicadas to buzzing loudly in the treetops, and not even the smallest of birds was to be seen or heard. Mimi knew well that she needed to get back to her village before nightfall. She was in no condition to face down another cat out hunting in the cover of night.

The fact of the matter was that Mimi wanted to get there sooner than nightfall—before her belly had a chance to compact much. That way she could proudly march into town and everyone would still be outdoors to see her. Then she would show Katya what a really full belly looks like, she thought proudly. Feeling this pride made her stand more upright, and she filled her lungs with air and held her chest forward. She really loved having such a huge belly! Patting its broad sides and feeling enormously self-fulfilled, she marveled about it out loud to herself, “Look at this huge belly! Boy, do I have a surprise for you, Katya!”

As she drank in the size of her giant tummy, Mimi rolled her a shoulder forward, first the left, and then rolled it back and brought her right forward. The motion caused her belly to sway back and forth as her spine twisted. “You've never had your belly get like mine, Katya,” she said seductively. Her long eyelashes flashed upward as looked around briefly, then they dropped again as her eyes resumed adoringly surveying her bulging body. “Not even close!”

Hands still rubbing the sides of the great expanse of belly below her, Mimi started to lean forward a bit so that her hands could wander to different places, to...wherever they could reach. Caressing herself all over her sloping sides, Mimi's balance issue completely left her mind, replaced by the enthrall and self-admiration for her gigantic belly. It was beautiful. She felt content in its company.

Savoring the blissful feeling, lost in fleeting, wispy thoughts that washed through her brain pleasurably, Mimi came to realize that the bigger her belly became, the happier she to felt. Each time she had eaten, she had experienced a comparable increase of this feeling of complete euphoria. How much more intense could it get? Could this wonderful feeling that she was now experiencing possibly get even better?

With this thought, Mimi suddenly felt very, very hungry.

She just had to eat more. She had to stuff more into her belly and make it even bigger. She wanted to see if this intensely satisfying feeling would grow right along with it. How had she never experienced this feeling before? It was wonderful. Is this what she had been missing out on among all her friends back at the village?

Well, things were different now. Now she could eat more than any of them. Even Sylvie. The thought of this filled her heart with further happiness as she thought about how her fellow villagers would be so enamored with her. Everyone would admire her belly so, and they would forget all about Katya with her huge, round breasts and that belly of hers that swelled so big each harvest season.

“I'll show Katya who can eat!” she declared, pounding her left fist onto her right palm for emphasis. “I'll show them all!”

As Mimi squared her elbows and planted her hands on her sides (as though upon her hips, which were somewhere unreachable), Mimi suddenly realized that somehow she was now standing comfortably. Gone was her uncomfortable lean. Ended was the struggling to support herself. At some point, she had shifted her belly beneath her, and now stood comfortably. Centered below her head and shoulders, her huge belly was now shaped like a rugby ball standing on end. It bulged out from all around her torso just below her delicate little ribcage, sloping downward in a slow arc. Beyond its horizon, it curved back in to finally meet Mimi's legs, which seemed to have spread a bit farther apart to support her better, and maybe they were a little thicker and longer, too.

“Well that works!” Mimi exclaimed happily, and started walking with confidence briskly toward her village. She bounced a bit with each stride.

1111111111111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com.

Scene 7: Homecoming
Several hours later, the evening was waxing into night and a half moon had long since risen high into the navy blue sky's twinkling canopy. Where the sky met the ground off in the distance, Mimi could see the lights of her village glowing warmly. The afternoon air had cooled only a little, and the evening had remained quite a comfortable temperature. The trail before her wandered through a meadow that was braided with a network of little streams whose flows somehow crossed each other without intermixing.

Although Mimi's belly had finished compacting, it still was indeed a sight to behold. More important, it was still much larger than Katya's had ever been. Mimi smiled contentedly, feeling her mass as it swayed with each step.

As she crossed one small brook, she plucked a couple long, green reeds, and continued walking as she began to weave them into something. Their dangling ends twisted and bounced and brushed her belly as she worked. In a moment or two, she had woven a tiny, round basket with a loophole on one end—the basis of one of many wood nymph tricks. She stopped to put on the finishing touches, and then held the basket near her face. Then she put her lips next to the basket's small opening, where two pieces of thinly twisted reed dangled. Quietly, Mimi made a light and very high pitched buzzing with her lips, almost too quiet to hear.

She waited a moment, and made the sound again. Then, she waited again.

This time when she made the buzzing sound, eight tiny lights streaked through the air drawing out their wildly changing trajectories in a trail of twinkling dust that faded away moments later. The lines finally all converged just in front of Mimi's full, pink lips where eight sparklebugs abruptly stopped to a hover. In an instant, Mimi scooped them up with the basket and pulled the two dangling reeds, quickly drawing the basket shut. She tied them firmly as the sparklebugs bounced about inside their tiny cage.

With an arc of scintillating dust falling from the little basket, Mimi brought it back to her face and peered into it with her big green eyes. They twinkled lovingly with joy at its frightened contents. Then Mimi placed her two palms on opposite side of the basket, gripped her fingers around it, and gave it a violent shake. She rattled it above her head, bouncing the eight hapless sparklebugs against their little cage until their glowing dust had made the entire basket all shimmery and bright. When she stopped, the eight sparklebugs crawled dizzily about the inside, drunkenly falling over each other, as they flopped together at the bottom of what was now a glowing lantern.

Mimi located a stick to use, and from one of its ends she hung the basket by its teeny loop. Holding the stick's other end, Mimi lofted it into the sparkelebug lantern into the air, looked up at it, and smiled contentedly. She marched on, holding her little light out before her.

A short while later, Mimi trudged up a short slope to the edge of her village. From the dark outskirts, Mimi surveyed a welcome sight. Firefly lanterns hanging on gnarled poles cast warm light outside the front door of each toadstool house. The streets were lined with them, too, and closer to the center of town big, domesticated luminary moths wafted about the air as they lazily flapped their broad wings and circled about the town commons. Here and there, several of the moths had lit atop the tall stalks of glowing white moonflowers, which the villagers regularly tended in order to provide food for them.

On the far end of town, Mimi could just make out the forms of two heavily swollen nymphs holding hands as they strolled together. The only nymphs that were still out and about, they could not see Mimi. As one would expect, the tan, dirt streets were otherwise barren—it was dinnertime.

Mimi turned left down the first cross street, and made her way directly to the last house. Less than a minute later, she stood at the far end of the pathway that gently curved through Katya's flower garden until it came to her front door. Rather than taking the path immediately, Mimi stayed at Katya's front gate, her huge form obscured by the late evening dim.

Bright yellow light shone out of Katya's windowpane, and through it Mimi watched as Katya busily placed a big harvest basket of shitakes onto the floor beside another similarly loaded basket. Mimi's mouth watered at the sight of them. A temblor rumbled through her vast tummy, as if demanding Mimi to take notice of it. Mimi's left hand reached around one of her huge breasts that still strained at her moss-colored shirt, and lovingly gave the upper reach of her quavering belly a reassuring pat.

Mimi saw Katya's hand gently snatch a big shitake mushroom, and Katya rose back upright from where she had set the basket down. Mimi admired Katya's bulbous abdomen as she stood, and it made her mouth water even more. Katya, preoccupied with readying yet another big dinner, absently raised the mushroom to her slowly parting, luscious lips and took a big bite from it.

Somewhere deep insider her, Mimi felt jealousy start to boil. Those mushrooms...Mimi needed them more than Katya. The dinner that Katya was preparing rightfully belonged to Mimi. Her brow scrunched as her eyes focused determinedly on Katya's belly. Those baskets were not the only place where Katya kept mushrooms. Mimi's hungry belly rumbled urgently with enthusiastic approval.
1111111111111.title: Let's actually go home now!

Scene 8: Revenge Served Large
The domicile of any given wood nymph is invariably similar to that of any other. Each is made from a large toadstool, the thick stem of which has been carefully hollowed out to make one large room which serves as a kitchen, bedroom and living room all in one. With only some shelves and pantries for storage, these living rooms have no furniture except for tens of colorful pillows strewn about on the floor. Wood nymphs have very few needs. But generally, the homes are warm and inviting places, perfect hang-out environments for comfortably entertaining friends, and binging on copious food in belly-stretching quantities during harvest time.

In these big living rooms, wood nymphs thicken the air with an intoxicatingly pleasant sandlewood incense. Amid the piles of pillows there would often stand a glass hookah, from which many stems dangled like an octopus's arms. “Hey, Katya, it's me, Cassia. Let me in. I managed to sneak off with a basket of morels. With Sylvie still eating nonstop, these are getting pretty scarce.”

Mimi leaned back, propping herself against the wall and called back merrily, “Come on inside, Cassia! I'm starving!”

A sudden thud, and then door swung open as Cassia backed in. Once she had stepped backward into the room, it was clear why she had entered so. There, partly balanced on her hugely swollen belly was an enormous basket overflowing with nice, fat morels.

“You should see her, Katya. She's twice as big around as she's ever been, and now everyone's lining up to feed her. They want to see how far she can go,” Cassia grunted as she set the basket down on the floor. She then finally turned to face the room and see her friend.

Cassia's jaw dropped with a sharp gasp.

What Cassia saw leaning against the wall dumbfounded her. Two thin, shapely legs were bent at the knees, with feet flat on the floor, on either side of the most immensely stuffed belly Cassia had ever seen. It wasn't just slightly bigger than a normal wood nymph's belly stuffed to capacity. It out-sized one by five or six fold. Staring in wide-eyed shock, Cassia tried to comprehend it as her eyes continued to scale its immense curve. Atop its great mass, Mimi's shoulders rested casually against the wall, her shirt straining to contain the huge bosom within. Above her lithe little shoulders, Mimi's delicate neck lead to her face. There was no mistaking Mimi's glowing smile or her mane of chestnut hair.

“Mimi?” Cassia asked cautiously. Jaw still slack, she leaned in as she stepped forward, mesmerized at the sight before her. “What happened to you? You're gigantic!”

Mimi looked down at the giant belly below her and smiled pleasantly. Her hands slowly caressed its surface as if even Mimi did not quite believe it.

“Oh, last night was quite an adventure...so I guess Sylvie found the glowing mushrooms?” Mimi asked as though there were little more worthy of explanation.

“But...how did you get so—” Cassia searched for the right word.

“Big?” Mimi offered. “It's a long story that we should talk about over dinner.”

Cassia replied uncertainly, “Uh, okay,” then turned back to get the basket, then walked back over to Mimi, and looked for a place to sit. Katya's numerous floor pillows were strangely absent.

“Where did all the pillows go?” she asked.

“Good question,” Mimi shrugged as she patted her belly smugly. “Katya normally has so many.”

Setting the basket between she and Mimi Cassia looked up at Mimi and asked, “And where's Katya?”

Still patting her belly, Mimi looked about the room. “That's weird. I could swear that she's in here somewhere.”

Then Mimi's belly rumbled with a burst of motion as Katya unexpectedly wriggled again. The sudden motion startled Cassia, and she slowly raised her forearm. An index finger extended at its end, pointing at the commotion stirring within Mimi. Her other hand covered her mouth as it slowly dawned on her what was going on.

“What was that?” whispered Cassia with a shaking voice. “Did you...Did you eat Katya?” She took a step back, and in a low voice she stated it as her eyes went wide again, this time with terror, “You ate Katya...you ate her...”

Mimi burst into action, springing forward at Cassia. Her huge mass was in motion in such a lightning-quick instant that the stunned Cassia had no chance to react before Mimi's massive tummy was shoving her backward. She stumbled backward until her body hit the door with a thud. Left slightly ajar, the door slammed shut, and against it Cassia was now pinned.

Mimi stepped forward, increasing the pressure of her immense belly against Cassia.

“Cassia! How could you think such a thing of me?” Mimi asked with a broad smile. Pressing against Cassia even more as she leaned in, Mimi explained, “I finally get an appetite, and your going to criticize me now for eating too much?”

Trapped by an increasing amount of Mimi's surface area squishing against her, Cassia felt Katya squirm again. She looked up at Mimi in terror. Tears welled in her eyes.

“Mimi, what's happened to you?”

“I'll show you,” she told Cassia. Mimi lifted an arm to show that she had somehow nabbed the big harvest basket during the commotion. With a wicked grin, Mimi said, “Let's eat.”

Mimi propped the basket on her belly, leaning it slightly inward, and held it with one hand while the other hand scooped up a large handful of the spongy mushrooms. “I can swallow all of this in one gulp,” she boasted. Then she demonstrated just that.

Caught somewhere between horror and awe, Cassia could only watch Mimi's surreal performance. “That's the same thing Sylvie has been doing...” she managed to whisper.

Mimi scooped up another handful, not quite as large, and said, “Now you try.” She pressed the mound into Cassias mouth, forcing her jaw open and filling her cheeks. Tears ran down Cassia's cheeks as she tried to swallow and failed.

“No, no, Cass,” said Mimi rolling her big, green eyes impatiently. “Like this.” Mimi lowered her lids, narrowing in on the mass of food in Cassia's mouth, framed by her luscious, widely-parted lips. She pressed against Cassia even more, bringing her lips to Cassia's. Her belly had enveloped Cassia's entire body now, allowing just the head and feet to protruded. Then Cassia felt Mimi suck the mass of mushrooms right out of her mouth and swallow them down. Mimi's left her moist lips intimately pressed to Cassia's for a moment before pulling back slightly.

Terrified tears were now streaming down from Cassia's deep blue eyes

“That's nothing, Cass. Watch this,” Mimi sighed wistfully. Then Mimi lifted the basket to her mouth and pressed the rest of the mushrooms—the whole basketful, minus the previous two handfuls—into her mouth and swallowed them in a single, enormous gulp. As the huge mass of mushrooms passed into Mimi's belly, Cassia felt its mass add to the already massive girth pressed against her.

With her own tummy so full and heavy, Cassia found that the relentless pressure was making it hard to breathe, but she managed to gasp out a plea, “But, Mimi, how can you eat your friends?”

“I'm not sure, Cass. Last night, I just started getting hungry. I started eating more and more mushrooms, and just couldn't get enough. On the way home, I came across Missy, and she had several baskets full. We started eating them, but I didn't want to share. So, when we ran out, the only mushrooms left for me to eat were inside of Missy. So I ate her. Oh, she was delicious, Cassia. You have no idea!” Mimi paused with a sigh as she remembered it. “Anyway, when I got back, I could hardly wait to eat Katya. You should have seen her, Cass. She was so huge. I wasn't sure I could do it, but there you go.” Mimi thrust her belly into Cassia to emphasize her point.

“And now, on to the next course,” Mimi grinned

Mimi then opened her wet lips widely around Cassia's face and engulfed Cassia's whole head. Backing from the door to free Cassia for easier swallowing, Mimi quickly slurped Cassia down past her shoulders, then over her huge breasts, and then somewhat more slowly around the swell of Cassia's distended belly. She then power-swallowed Cassia right down into her. It was over in an instant.

Cassia squirmed and writhed inside of her in a most satisfying way. But for some reason, Mimi was uncomfortable. She stood slightly stooped, and her legs bent a little at the knees in order to fit under Katya's bright yellow ceiling.

Mimi laid upon her back to rest and enjoy all of Cassia's antics within her. Her belly bulged upward in a huge dome, undulating with her latest meal.

“Well,” Mimi sighed to herself as she reveled in feeling coming from with her glorious belly, I think it's almost time to find out for real just how big Sylvie got herself. I'll certainly show her some stuffing.”
111111111111111111.title: It's Cassia.

1111111111111111111.content:
http://e-v-p.deviantart.com
Scene 10: Comfort Food
Mimi's hands groped the upper slopes of her belly. With Missy, Katya, and now Cassia all packed tightly inside her, still intermittently squirming, Mimi felt a new sensation. It started in her chest, and like a fire she felt it course through every part of her chest, head and arms. It then spread throughout her whole belly, overtaking Mimi entirely until it finally spread down her legs. The feeling was raw, unbridled lust. She needed more. She had to get more in her. She looked down where her belly's girth shuddered with another bout of internal struggle.

"Mmmm! You feel it, too, don't you, ladies? You can feel it! But you can't do anything about it because you're inside of me," Mimi tittered gaily. She patted the area that had been the movement's epicenter. "I'll show you, Kat. I'll show you some stuffing. I'm still plenty hungry!" declared Mimi. She stepped toward Katya's kitchen door, somewhat crouched because of Katya's oppressively low ceiling.

Mimi opened it and pushed her upper torso through. The girth of her belly met the doorframe, filling it completely. She started to squirm to pull herself through, but the narrow doorway resisted stubbornly. Getting a bit more of her belly through, she paused and gasped for breath. "What am I doing?" she thought. "This is keeping me from dinner!"

Suddenly Mimi flexed her belly outward, and the door's perimeter expanded as cracks radiated outward across the toadstool from the doorframe's curving outer edges. Through the widened aperture, Mimi then caused the bulk of her belly to flow forward until her legs came out. They seemed so tiny, scurrying to urge the massive abdomen along, pressing up under her until she was back upright again.

Standing in Katya's front yard and out in the open again, Mimi could better appreciate her full size. Her head was higher than the bottom of Katya's mushroom-cap roofline, which made her just a little more than an extra third taller than most of her fellow villagers. And since all of Mimi's newfound height was in her gargantuanly round belly, Mimi thought that she might look a bit suspicious, so she doused Katya's yard lantern (Gulp!), and then looked up the lane. Where might she find Sylvie, she wondered. But the lantern's surprisingly pleasant flavor distracted her, and soon she was considering Katya's toadstool house curiously.

On a hunch, Mimi touched her tongue to the lower edge of Katya's roof. After all, she thought, it's just a really big mushroom.

It was delicious!

Mimi took a huge bite out of the overhanging edge. She had intended to chew it cautiously, but when the flavor hit her tongue her instinct kicked in. With a sudden convulsion of her gigantic belly, Mimi power-swallowed it so fast that it made a muffled thud as the chunk impacted the mass contained within.

Mimi shook her head with surprise, and was then immediately at it again. This time she took a much bigger bite, and this time her belly performed the same power assist, completely subconsciously. It wanted more.

The recoil from the implosive belly swallow caused Mimi's neck to whip her head forward for another huge bite into the roofline. With this next gulp, she used the rebound of her belly to propel herself forward, allowing the momentum to stretch her mouth around a larger part of the roofline. Clamping her teeth down without biting through, she retracted again and this time tore off a chunk so large that it left a hole that let moonlight into Katya's living room.

For only a split second, Mimi considered the huge piece of toadstool protruding from her lips. Then with a huge surge of her gigantic belly, she sucked it down in a single gulp, feeling its spongy mass compress as it passed through her throat and then expand again as it entered her belly. The sensation exhilarated Mimi. She wanted more of it.

Mimi stood tall enough now that the she could almost reach the rounded peak of the toadstool's broad cap, the highest point of Katya's cottage. She made herself as tall as her belly would allow, leaned on the sumptuous roof, and standing on tiptoes, she got her lips as close to the top as she could. This time she took no bite. Instead she commanded her belly to lung forward, causing the whole house to lean away from her slightly as her mouth took in as much as she could stand. At exactly that point, she forced the hardest swallow she could muster. The house shuddered and rocked back toward Mimi as her belly suddenly shifted the direction of force. Mimi felt the roof begin sliding through her lips and mouth, down into her throat. Could she do this?

The broad cap of the toadstool began compressing, gills folding together flat as its circumference shrank. Katya had been big, but Mimi's mouth was now stretched wider than it had ever been. The roof cap separated from its stem as Mimi continued the gigantic gulp. She felt it crumple in on itself like an umbrella as it moved glacier-like through her mouth and throat. Each centimeter deeper, the roof's mass got thicker and thicker, but Mimi pressed upward into its weight.

When the gigantic cap started uncompressing inside of her, Mimi's belly expanded outward exponentially. The end was in sight and soon Mimi's hands were able to push the last of the giant mass past her tongue and down her throat.

Mimi then looked down with amazement at her belly expanding in all directions as the spongy mass within her slowly regained more of its original volume. She sensed he ground becoming more distant, and her girth widened before her own eyes. It felt wonderful.

In another moment, Mimi started on the stem walls, swallowing its hollowed circumference clockwise and with only a little less difficulty. Laying down in the large hole left in the ground, Mimi once again relished the sensation of the spongy toadstool expanding within her. Her monstrous tum rose like dough in fast frame motion. When it was over, Mimi's enormity filled the entire space once occupied by Katya's little home.

Looking up at the overstuffed dome belly, Mimi smirked as her tiny hand patted a small area of her great curvature.

"You catch all that, Katya?" she asked her belly. "Tonight, you're gonna see some stuffing!"

Somewhere far off on the other side of her, two little legs wriggled with giddy pleasure.

(BTW, this is the end of the original author's story)
1111111111111111111.title: She's too big to get out!
